body.p: One fateful day, a thief names Flynn Rider scalers Rapunzel's tower in an attempt to hide from the royal guards chasing him. Though he is charming and quick-witted, Rapunzel overpowers him and hides his secret treasure. She decides to make a deal with him: take her to see the floating lights and she will give him his treasure back. Since Rapunzel had successfully tied him to a chair and put an apple in his mouth, Flynn had no choice but to accept.
